If you have the "copy error '5'" right in the beginning of the installation? Do the following:
Copy all files from the image to your hard disk drive, except the crack folder. Now create a file named manager12.exe in the folder on your hard disk. Install the game

here is how to work the game for people who are getting the orgin account message 

1.go to the installation directory
2.go to the cracked folder
3. double click on the fifa manager 12 icon
4.it will say gfxcore.dll is missing
5.go back to the installation directory and find gfxcore.dll
6.move that to the crack folder
7.double click the fifa manager 12 icon
8.enjoy the game
